rules.active: Increases your rapport with a visible character

details.flavour: If you were words on a card, you'd be some fine print.

rules.active: Causes a visible character to like you.

details.flavour: Do you like raisins? How do you feel about a date?

details.rules: Causes a visible character to become attracted to you.
details.flavour: There’s only one thing I want to change about you, and that’s your last name.

details.rules: Force any character you can name to act on their desire for you.
details.flavour: Here I am - Your other two wishes?

details.rules: Speak with any living NPC. Return this card to the deck and draw another.
details.flavour: How'd you get this number? I don't even own a phone!

details.rules: Speak with any dead NPC. Return this card to the deck and draw another.
details.flavour: How'd you get this number? I didn't even own a phone when I was alive!

details.rules: Target visible NPC can no longer feel negative emotions towards target visible character.
Target NPC fails their current action and loses focus on you
details.flavour: "Ok one sec my homework is in my bag I'll grab it in a minute. How was your weekend?" - Little Sniver

details.rules: Target NPC will believe your next statement.
details.flavour: "Yeah of course I did my homework" - Little Sniver

details.rules: Change your appearance to match that of another exactly for as long as you'd like.
details.flavour: "I'm Revins, Sniver went into the other room to get his homework." - Little Sniver

details.rules: Rewrite the contents of a visible character's memory
details.flavour: "I'm at the end of my rope. I am done with homework. I will simply erase homework from the memory of the people" - Little Sniver

details.rules: An aura surrounds you. NPCs believe this spell had the effect of your choice
Swap two words in a character's vocabulary until the end of the day. The character will be unaware that they are saying the wrong word.
details.flavour: "You cannot escape the responsibility of tomorrow by evading it today." - Edward the Lax

details.rules: An aura surrounds you. NPCs who fail a perception check believe this spell had the effect of your choice.
details.flavour: "I don't know exactly what he did.. but I just don't feel.. right? Know what I mean?" - Barry the Bandit
